pages.text: Now that you've got your feet under you, find out some of the advanced things that Amethyst Imbuement can provide.$(li)Craft a scepter and start spellcasting$(li)Create imbued jewelry and imbue them with powerful abilities$(li)Upgrade your equipment beyond anything you thought possible

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_mat.text: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst)Amethyst Shards$() are the entrypoint to Amethyst Imbuement, find yourself a geode! $(item)Crying Obsidian$() is an important ingredient in AI altars.

amethyst_imbuement:flower_power.text: Many recipes use flowers, especially the 4 double-high flowers ($(item)Sunflower$(), $(item)Peony$(), $(item)Rose Bush$(), $(item)Lilac$()). Find in various fields and forests.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/imbuing_t.text: Craft your $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$(), opening the door to most of the rest of the mod!

amethyst_imbuement:xp_bush.text: The imbuing table is powered by experience. Imbue some $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/xp_bush_seed)Experience Bushes$() to secure a steady flow of the stuff. Augment your supply by enchanting gear with $(l:amethyst_imbuement:enchantments/new_weapon_enchants#insight)Insight$().

pages.title: Scepter Spellcasting
pages.text: Scepters are magical sources from which you can cast many offensive and defensive spells. Read $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/scepter_guide)this guide$() to learn how to get started with these powerful and flexible tools.$(br2)You can follow an $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_upgrading)upgrade path$() for your scepter to specialize it and increase its power!

pages.title: Trinket Imbuing
pages.text: You can adorn yourself with magical jewelry, and even craft a special totem, that provide you with status effect bonuses and other powerful abilities. Read about the trinkets you can create:$(br2)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/jewelry_guide)Jewelry$()$(br)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_guide)Totems$()

pages.title: Upgrade Equipment
pages.text: There is a wide variety of new gear to craft, as well as upgrades available for new and existing items to check out!$(br)$(l)
